constraints.name: frequency_bound
constraints.description: 字符串中某个子串出现的次数至少为 m 次

constraints.name: subsequence_constraint
constraints.description: 找到最长的满足频率约束的子串

constraints.name: last_occurrence
constraints.description: 在多个满足条件的子串中，选择最右出现位置的子串

constraints.name: frequency_bound
constraints.description: 字符串中某个子串出现的次数至少为 m 次

constraints.name: subsequence_constraint
constraints.description: 找到最长的满足频率约束的子串
constraints.formal: max(len(sub)) such that count(s, sub) >= m

constraints.name: last_occurrence
constraints.description: 在多个满足条件的子串中，选择最右出现位置的子串
constraints.formal: argmax(r) such that s[r:r+len(sub)] == sub and count(s, sub) >= m

result.description: 求满足条件的最长子串长度

objective.description: 求满足条件的最长子串长度

invariants.name: interval_mergeable
invariants.description: 区间可合并性：通过子区间的合并来维护整个区间的重复次数信息

invariants.name: optimal_substructure
invariants.description: 最优子结构：最长重复子串的解可以通过其子问题的解来构建
